title: Double-sided engineering for space-confined reversible Zn anodes
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,1894-1903
DOI: 10.1039/D3EE04292H, Communication
Yong Gao, Nute Yang, Fan Bu, Qinghe Cao, Jie Pu, Yuxuan Wang, Ting Meng, Jipeng Chen, Wenbo Zhao, Cao Guan
Zn anodes with double-sided engineering are rationally designed and facilely constructed, which generates a space-confined reversible Zn deposition behavior, thus enabling stable Zn anode working at high depth of discharge with high energy density.
